Package com.dua3.meja.ui.fx

Class FxRow

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent

javafx.scene.control.Labeled
javafx.scene.control.Cell<FxRow.Index>
javafx.scene.control.IndexedCell<FxRow.Index>
com.dua3.meja.ui.fx.FxRow
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
public class FxRow extends javafx.scene.control.IndexedCell<FxRow.Index>
A custom cell implementation for rendering rows in a spreadsheet. It extends the IndexedCell class and overrides several methods to customize the appearance and behavior of the cell.

    • getWidthInPixels

      public float getWidthInPixels(javafx.geometry.Side side)
      Retrieves the width of a row in pixels for the specified side.
      Parameters:
      side - determines the segment for which to return the row width; the allowed values are Side.LEFT and Side.RIGHT
      Returns:
      the width of the row in pixels for the specified side
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if an invalid value is passed for side
